title: Hide and seek on summoners rift!
body:
With the crystal scar gone ... and our hopes shattered{{item:3073}}  WE WILL MOVE ON. So let's play hide and seek on the summoners rift :). First, as a hider, you have 30 seconds to get into a jungle area. (Purple circle)  http://i68.tinypic.com/2efkflv.png . Once a hider enters the jungler area, they cannot leave (as doing so requires you to cross lanes). The hiders are only allowed to use red trinkets, and the seekers can only use green ones, and are able to travel around the whole map. 

sooo yeah, this is just my idea of hide and seek because i love that game mode and i still want to play it :( thanks~ If you have any questions, feel free to ask

replies.body:
For those new to HnS, here are the rules.

1. PermaBan:{{champion:107}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:17}} 
2. 5 hiders, 2 seekers.
3. Hiders are only aloud to use CC abilities.
4. Only MS can be built.
5. Seekers must recall when below 300hp, otherwise hiders are aloud to kill you.
6. Each hider gets 5 lives (4 if only 4 hiders).

Enjoy.

(Comment for other permabans, not sure if only they are the only ones).

question why is Rengar getting banned?

Because his ult is OP in hide and seek. It gives vision and a massive gap closer. 

Most follow the general rule of just outright banning any invis champs, but some allow Twitch/Shaco for hiders.
I thought rengar, twitch and shaco werent perma, thats why they always get bannned
rengar is only perma for seekers, twitch and shaco arent.

Shaco isn't perma as well as twitch.

Different people have different rules..

few questions:

1) are we destroying all outer and inner towers first or are they just gonna be obstacles?
2) Minions High chance riot aren't gonna remove minions so what we doing bout them?
3) what about dragon/baron/herald/buff monsters(red/blue) and smiting jg creatures since smiting wolves give a nice vis orb can we/can't we use them?

1/2 Don't touch turrets or minions, they'll pretty much deal with themselves so long as you don't interrupt them. You are only allowed in the jungle, and out through the wall gates to get into the jungle after you die (this was how I played it anyway) You can cross to the other side of the jungle ONLY through the very middle of mid lane (at river).

3 No buffs/smites/etc, they are too strong, especially wolf/red. Baron/Herald would screw up the minions, you need three drags for the move speed so it's not worth it, and all the others aren't all that useful.

Given the size of SR I would think that Blue trinkets may be allowed instead of yellow but only maybe 5 for each team. If there are 5 down you cant use another until one gets destroyed. That seems fair to me. But yellow trinkets work too.

Largely Hide and Seek comes down to honour rules and restrictions that vary from host to host but, there are a few constants like banning invis champs.
